column5: Welcome to the historic Redbird Guest House! This charming 600 sq ft private guest house is part of a beautiful 20 acre private ranch at the edge of San Antonio and a gateway to the Texas Hill Country.  Nearby attractions are the town of Castroville, Sea World, Lackland AFB, and Medina Lake.  You have access to the private pool, hiking trails, as well as your own private outdoor fire pit and picnic area. Enjoy feeding the horses and s'mores by the fire as you relax and get away from it all!
